content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Sites The following table describes the site information displayed on the Sites tab. Sites Column Description Display Name Type the name that displays on the Security Posture widget/tab. Note By default, the Others group includes endpoints that do not belong to any site. Site The site name synchronized from Active Directory Related information Creating a Custom Site Merging Sites Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
